page.title: 04CLUBS IN TERLING
page.content: There are many clubs and groups in the village; below is a list of them all. Clay shooting, Cricket, Swimming Club, Badminton, Tennis, Brownies, Scouts, Guides, Football, Terling Jubilee Concert Party (Drama), Always Welcome (Over 60's), Youth club, Gym, Womens Institute, Mothers Union, Mothers and toddlers group, British Legion and the Horticultural Club. The village swimming pool}is run as a club,relying on voluntary help to man the kiosk and is open from May to September. Terling school makes use of it as often as possible, weather permitting.The{Horticultural Club}runs a flower and vegetable show each year usually in September.The{Drama Group,} apart from putting on the occasional play, often arranges " Poems and Pints" evenings and the annual Summer Festival, profits to the village hall.
